issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Hi,

Installing SDK 6.3.0.v20171026154532 manually has solved the issue w.r.t ticket no. *Titanium SDK/CLITIMOB-25446* & i'm able to get the expected result in simulator.

Now i was about to generate a new build for itunes using above SDK but i'm getting following error.

{color:red}[ERROR] : Invalid "--pp-uuid" value "c75fd452-e580-4577-b77f-3917915c2586"
For help, run: titanium.js help build
{color}

If i change the SDK back to 6.2.2 GA i'm able to generate the ipa.

Certificates & provisioning profiles are valid for my project.

Awaiting for reply.

Thanks.

comments.body:
Hello [~Suraj Datta],

Can you check whether the pp-uuid *c75fd452-e580-4577-b77f-3917915c2586* is listed in the *appc info* from the CLI.And, verify what provisioning profile is selected in the Run-configurations from the Studio. Here you go.
*Run Configurations -> Appcelerator iOS Device -> Main tab -> Settings -> Select Provisioning Profile*

Thanks

Hello Mostafizur Rahman,

Above uuid is listed in the appc info. Btw i was trying to generate IPA file for itunes where  i'm getting the above issue.
So under provision profile i'm selecting the lastest one needed for my app & then packaging the app.

As per ticket TIMOB-25416 i've cleared unwanted certificates & restarted my machine. But still facing the same issue.

Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks.
Please try the PR provided in TIMOB-25416 and add your comment to the existing thread, thx!
